description: The .38-40 Winchester is an enigma of a bullet, while it is very simmilar to the .44-40 its preformance is sliglty under. It does have the advantage of being able to be loaded in both a pistol and a rifle, allowing just one ammo type needing to be carried.

name: .38-40 casing
description: An empty casing from a .38-40 round.
